Caption: Locked and loaded boss, give the order.
Name: Barracks-Intro

Caption: Locked and loaded boss, give the order.
Name: Barracks-Intro

Caption: Locked and loaded boss, give the order.
Name: Barracks-Intro

Caption: Oh, reminds me a bit of home out there, you know, just colder.
Name: Biome-Arctic-001

Caption: You know for once, I'm actually kind of glad to have a hot reactor in the mech.
Name: Biome-Arctic-002

Caption: Ah hell I need to scrape some ice off the cockpit.
Name: Biome-Arctic-003

Caption: Oh, these canyons are starting to make me nervous, that’s an easy ambush from up there.
Name: Biome-Canyon-001

Caption: Ah, narrow passages and blind corners. Lovely.
Name: Biome-Canyon-002

Caption: Careful out there you don't want to go running of the edge of that cliff, that is a long way down.
Name: Biome-Canyon-003

Caption: Keep an eye out on those ridge lines. All those trees make it an easy ambush.
Name: Biome-Canyon-Lush-001

Caption: Be careful you don't trip on a root. You don't want to go falling into that canyon.
Name: Biome-Canyon-Lush-002

Caption: Ah, I am going to be cleaning dust out of the actuators for months.
Name: Biome-Desert-001

Caption: Ah, doesn't look like there is much to see out there. Just sand and more sand.
Name: Biome-Desert-002

Caption: Well, this is certainly going to stress out the heatsinks.
Name: Biome-Desert-003

Caption: Yeah, I wouldn't mind retiring in a place like this.
Name: Biome-Earthlike-001

Caption: Well, this place is pretty nice. It won't be for too long with us here, but you know.
Name: Biome-Earthlike-002

Caption: Ha, figures. We finally get to a nice planet and now we gotta go tear it up.
Name: Biome-Earthlike-003

Caption: Gah, I wish we weren't tearing this place up. Look at the colors out there.
Name: Biome-Forest-Fall-001

Caption: Ah, it's beautiful out there. Wouldn't mind a vacation, once we are done with the fighting.
Name: Biome-Forest-Fall-002

Caption: All these leaves are going to help with the camouflage, but that goes for both sides. So keep an eye out.
Name: Biome-Forest-Fall-003

Caption: Hey uh, what say we drop this contract and just take a vacation.
Name: Biome-Forest-Summer-001

Caption: Hey uh, keep an eye out for any good fishing spots.
Name: Biome-Forest-Summer-002

Caption: Uh, shame were about to raise some hell down there. It’s a good looking place.
Name: Biome-Forest-Summer-003

Caption: Yeah, this has got me right in my element here.
Name: Biome-Forest-Winter-001

Caption: Ah, now this, this is home.
Name: Biome-Forest-Winter-002

Caption: Yeah, this brings me right back home.
Name: Biome-Forest-Winter-003

Caption: Hey, watch your step out there. You really don't want to step on that ice.
Name: Biome-Glacier-001

Caption: I'm starting to think my actuators are freezing over. Damn it!
Name: Biome-Glacier-002

Caption: Yeah, this place looks like a battlefield alright.
Name: Biome-Hostile-001

Caption: Wow, this is a lovely place.
Name: Biome-Hostile-002

Caption: Really hope I don't have to punch out here. I'll just check the O2 just to be safe.
Name: Biome-Hostile-Moon-001

Caption: Well, hope these life support systems hold out here.
Name: Biome-Hostile-Moon-002

Caption: Well, this is a charming place.
Name: Biome-Hostile-Sulfur-001

Caption: Ah, this place is wreaking havoc on my mechs joints.
Name: Biome-Hostile-Sulfur-002

Caption: Man, I am going to need heatsinks for my heatsinks out here.
Name: Biome-Volcano-001

Caption: Ugh, as if the reactor wasn't hot enough in here already.
Name: Biome-Volcano-002

Caption: Copy dog pile on the target.
Name: Combat-Affirm-AttackLance-003

Caption: Move as a group, you got it.
Name: Combat-Affirm-MoveLance-001

Caption: Copy lead moving to nav point.
Name: Combat-Affirm-MoveLance-004

Caption: Alright, here we go. Safety's off.
Name: Combat-Affirm-WeaponsFree-002

Caption: Sightline is blocked. I can't hit him.
Name: Combat-Neg-Attack-003

Caption: I don't have your target commander.
Name: Combat-Neg-Attack-004

Caption: Negative. Can't find the footing lead.
Name: Combat-Neg-Move-001

Caption: I can't find the path, gonna have to try something else.
Name: Combat-Neg-Move-002

Caption: Negative on that move. Root is blocked commander.
Name: Combat-Neg-Move-003

Caption: No-go on that commander. No clear path.
Name: Combat-Neg-Move-004

Caption: Starting to see daylight through the cockpit here.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-001

Caption: Well that sounded expensive. I just lost a component.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-002

Caption: I can't take much more of this fire here. I am losing parts.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-003

Caption: Ah, damn it. I just replaced that too. Component lost.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-004

Caption: Left arm just got blown off.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-LA

Caption: Why you little. Ah, you took off my left leg.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-LL

Caption: Ah, my left torso just took critical damage.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-LT

Caption: Well, I started the day with a right arm.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-RA

Caption: Now I lost the right leg, but I still think I can limp it home.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-RL

Caption: Uh, there is a whole in my right torso. It's gone.
Name: Dialogue-ComponentLost-RT

Caption: Oh no, reactor is breached. I gotta punch out.
Name: Dialogue-Critical

Caption: Ejected! But that was way closer than I would have liked.
Name: Dialogue-EjectCrit

Caption: Ah damnit, I liked this mech too.
Name: Dialogue-EjectHelpless-001

Caption: Ah, dead in the water here. Punching out.
Name: Dialogue-EjectHelpless-004

Caption: Nah, I got nothing left. You're on your own.
Name: Dialogue-EjectHelpless-005

Caption: Uh my reactor is failing. I am outta here.
Name: Dialogue-EjectScared-001

Caption: Mayday Mayday Maday. Mech is critical. I'm Ejecting.
Name: Dialogue-EjectScared-002

Caption: Fire in the cockpit. I got fire in the cockpit. I'm out of here.
Name: Dialogue-EjectScared-003

Caption: Life support is failing. I gotta punch it!
Name: Dialogue-EjectScared-004

Caption: Hey you watch yourself, or you're paying for the repairs.
Name: Dialogue-FriendlyFire-001

Caption: Hit'em right in the core commander. Now watch those fireworks.
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-CongratsComm

Caption: Put one straight through the windshield. Nice!
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-CongratsHeadshot-001

Caption: They'll have to hose the pilot out after that one.
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-CongratsHeadshot-002

Caption: Whoop, watch out. That one is about to pop.
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-Crit-001

Caption: Yep, that mech's not getting back up.
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-Crit-003

Caption: Well today certainly wasn't their day.
Name: Dialogue-KillCheer-Mech-004

Caption: Uh we just lost one commander.
Name: Dialogue-LanceDown-001

Caption: One of ours just got knocked out.
Name: Dialogue-LanceDown-002

Caption: Just you and me now lead. Lets give'em hell.
Name: Dialogue-LastStand-001

Caption: Well lead, it's all on us now. No pressure.
Name: Dialogue-LastStand-002

Caption: Well, I'm itching for some payback. How about you commander?
Name: Dialogue-LastStand-003

Caption: Sensors lit up. Got new contacts.
Name: Dialogue-Spotted-002

Caption: We got fast movers coming in.
Name: Dialogue-Spotted-VTOL-003

Caption: Locked on to narc target. Missile away.
Name: Fire-NARC-003

Caption: Yeah I see'em. Firing on the tagged target.
Name: Fire-TAG-001

Caption: Narc out. Look for the marked target.
Name: Mark-NARC-003

Caption: Alright, one final systems check, and we are golden. Lets go!
Name: Mission-Intro-002

Caption: Board is green. Everything is good. Lets go commander.
Name: Mission-Intro-003

Caption: Show time boys and girls. Lets make it a good one.
Name: Mission-Intro-004

Caption: Well, happy to be a part of this commander. Let's get too it.
Name: Pilot-Hired
